ovdesc.p: This table contains the rule that needs to be checked against a particular instance of activity. The specified rule here is validated and a Boolean status is returned. The condition could be a direct checking of the particular value in the current record or could be a routine. An activity can have multiple transition rules attached.

desc.p: A valid field number on the application associated with the PW.ACTIVITY record (to which this record will be attached).
There is NO validation on this field to ensure that the field number exists on the associated application.
Used in conjunction with multi-value group, SELECTION.FIELD.
If set to AND then the conditions set up in the SELECTION.FIELD multi-value group will have to be met as well as the conditions set in the routine indicated in the ROUTINE field.
Only AND, OR or a blank field is valid.
If both SELECTION.FIELDS and a Routine is defined SELECTION.OPERAND must be set.
Local routine name – routine to return 1 argument containing an error if conditions or rules within the local routine are not met.
This is the key by which the PW.TRANSITION record can be identified.

The PW.TRANSITION record sets conditions or rules, which determines if the status of the PW.ACTIVITY.TXN record changes, subsequently resulting in the population of the next PW.ACTIVITY.TXN (activity) in a process.
Specifies the value with which the contents of the field indicated in SELECTION.FIELD are to be compared.
Up to 35 alphanumeric characters. Part of the Multi-value set associated with SELECTION.FIELD.
Sub-value field. (Mandatory input if SELECTION.FIELD is entered, otherwise input is not allowed.)
Describes the PW.TRANSITION record and is used for enrichment of the key.
Specifies the type of comparison to be made between the contents of the field indicated in SELECTION.FIELD and the value specified in the CRITERIA field.
The conditions of this record are said to be met if these conditions have been satisfied.
The meanings of the Inputs are as follows:
GE Greater than or Equal to
LE Less than or Equal to
EQ, GE, GT, LE, LT, NE, LK, UL or no input. Multi-value field associated with Fields 2 and 4. (Mandatory input if SELECTION.FIELD is entered, otherwise input is not allowed.)
